Uses of Class
org.jfree.chart.plot.DatasetRenderingOrder

Packages that use DatasetRenderingOrder
Package Description
org.jfree.chart.plot
Plot classes and related interfaces.

  • Uses of DatasetRenderingOrder in org.jfree.chart.plot

    Fields in org.jfree.chart.plot declared as DatasetRenderingOrder
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static DatasetRenderingOrder DatasetRenderingOrder.FORWARD
    Render datasets in the order 0, 1, 2, ..., N-1, where N is the number of datasets.
    static DatasetRenderingOrder DatasetRenderingOrder.REVERSE
    Render datasets in the order N-1, N-2, ..., 2, 1, 0, where N is the number of datasets.
    Methods in org.jfree.chart.plot that return DatasetRenderingOrder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DatasetRenderingOrder CategoryPlot.getDatasetRenderingOrder()
    Returns the dataset rendering order.
    DatasetRenderingOrder XYPlot.getDatasetRenderingOrder()
    Returns the dataset rendering order.
    Methods in org.jfree.chart.plot with parameters of type DatasetRenderingOrder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void CategoryPlot.setDatasetRenderingOrder​(DatasetRenderingOrder order)
    Sets the rendering order and sends a PlotChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
    void XYPlot.setDatasetRenderingOrder​(DatasetRenderingOrder order)
    Sets the rendering order and sends a PlotChangeEvent to all registered listeners.
